001package org.consensusj.bitcoin.jsonrpc;
002
003import java.net.URI;
004
005/**
006 * Interface with default connection information for Bitcoin JSON-RPC
007 */
008public interface RpcURI {
009    String rpcproto = "http";
010    String rpcssl = "https";
011    String rpchost = "127.0.0.1";
012    String rpcfile = "/";
013
014    int RPCPORT_MAINNET = 8332;
015    int RPCPORT_TESTNET = 18332;
016    int RPCPORT_REGTEST = 18443;  // Was same port as TESTNET until Bitcoin Core 0.16.0
017
018    URI DEFAULT_MAINNET_URI = rpcURI( rpchost, RPCPORT_MAINNET);
019    URI DEFAULT_TESTNET_URI = rpcURI( rpchost, RPCPORT_TESTNET );
020    URI DEFAULT_REGTEST_URI = rpcURI( rpchost, RPCPORT_REGTEST);
021
022    // TODO: Deprecate?
023    URI defaultMainNetURI = DEFAULT_MAINNET_URI;
024    URI defaultTestNetURI = DEFAULT_TESTNET_URI;
025    URI defaultRegTestURI = DEFAULT_REGTEST_URI;
026
027    static URI getDefaultMainNetURI() {
028        return DEFAULT_MAINNET_URI;
029    }
030
031    static URI getDefaultTestNetURI() {
032        return DEFAULT_TESTNET_URI;
033    }
034
035    static URI getDefaultRegTestURI() {
036        return DEFAULT_REGTEST_URI;
037    }
038
039    static URI getDefaultRegTestWalletURI() {
040        return getRegTestWalletURI(rpchost);
041    }
042
043    static URI getRegTestWalletURI(String hostName) {
044        return rpcWalletURI(hostName, RPCPORT_REGTEST, BitcoinExtendedClient.REGTEST_WALLET_NAME);
045    }
046
047    static URI rpcURI(String hostName, int port) {
048        return URI.create(rpcproto + "://" + hostName + ":" + port + rpcfile);
049    }
050
051    static URI rpcWalletURI(String hostName, int port, String walletName) {
052        return URI.create(rpcproto + "://" + hostName + ":" + port + "/wallet/" + walletName);
053    }
054}
